description.long_desc: You stand on the small porch of a brick house adorned with climbing ivy.
The trees in front of you are too thick to travel through. However, they appear young enough that, with the right tools, you might be able to clear a path...
description.short_desc: You stand in front of a section of young trees.
description.blocked_desc: The trees in front of you are too thick to travel through. However, they appear young enough that, with the right tools, you might be able to clear a path...
description.outside_desc: You stand outside the chicken coop

interactions.name: open
interactions.success_desc: The door opens and you enter.
